name: FlyLaru
description:
Game proposal made for the third semester of the college of games at Fatec São Caetano do Sul - Antonio Russo

Little laru has lost his family and needs to get out of this dark forest as soon as possible! Can you help him?

░ ░ ░░░  ☼  ░░░ ░ ░

In this game you control the little Laru Batrelin (an anagram of "Luar Brilhante" in Portuguese), in the middle of a dark forest and completely stunned by being hungry and looking for his family.

The Maze + FlappyBird inspired mechanics

  • Dodge the trunks that will appear faster and faster
  • Eat as many bugs as you can! (but be careful not to lose track of laru in pursuit of these little snacks)
  • Get items to help you on your journey, but be careful as not everything will help you!

History and Art

  • The main inspiration of the game was the urutau (Common potoo) bird itself
  • Songs + Original Sound Effects!

░ ░░  ☼  ░░ ░

Controls Move MousePauseEsc

**Fullscream not adapted
